include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <style> /* start of CSS */
       
        /* creates title block in header space */
        .quarto-title-block { 
          /* removes container constraints */
          margin-top: 0 !important;
          padding-top: 0 !important;
          padding-bottom: 0 !important;
          margin-left: calc(50% - 50vw); 
          /*continer to flexbox*/
          display: flex; 
          /*stacks title, subtitle, and description */
          flex-direction: column; 
          /*centers title, subtitle, and description horizontally and vertically */
          align-items: center; 
          justify-content: center; 
          /* makes height and width block fixed % of viewport */
          height: 80vh; 
          width: 100vw;
          /* centers text inside element */
          text-align: center; 
          /* removes default spacing */
          padding: 0; 
          /* makes block relative point for positioning other elements */
          position: relative; 
          /* background image */
          background-image: url("images/sample.png");
          background-size: cover; 
          background-position: center; 
          background-repeat: no-repeat; 
        }
        
        /* remove padding gap between navbar and header*/
        body[style*="padding-top"] { padding-top: 0 !important; }
        
        /* creates psuedo-element (overlay) before block */
        .quarto-title-block::before { 
          content: ""; 
          /* position of overlay over the block */
          position: absolute;
          top: 0;
          left: 0;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%; 
          /* 40% black overlay */
          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); 
          z-index: 0;
        }
        
        /* selects text */
        .quarto-title-block .title,
        .quarto-title-block .subtitle,
        .quarto-title-block .description { 
          position: relative; 
          z-index: 1; 
          color: white; 
        }
        
        /* specific title font preference */
        .title { 
          font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 5rem); 
          font-weight: bold;
          margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        /* specific subtitle font preference */
        .subtitle {
          font-size: clamp(1rem, 2vw, 1.5rem); 
          margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }
        
        /* specific description font preference */
        .description {
          font-size: clamp(0.9rem, 1.5vw, 1.2rem); 
          max-width: 600px;
          margin: 0 auto; 
        }
      /* end of CSS */ </style>

<!--# formatting -->

```{=html}
<style> 
/* start of CSS for formating */
  /* responsive grid layout */
  .News-grid {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(180px, 1fr));
    gap: 150px;
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }
  
  /* card alignment */
  .News-card {
    text-align: center;
  }

  /* image formating */
  .News-card img {
    width: 250px;
    height: 300px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 0%;
    margin-top: 1.1rem;
  }

  /* heading formating */
  .News-card h3 {
    margin-top: 0.8rem;
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    font-weight: normal;
    color: black;
  }

  .News-card h6 {
      margin-top: 0.3rem;
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      color: grey;
    }
  
  .News-card h8 {
      margin-top: 0.3rem;
      font-size: 0.8rem;
      color: grey;
    }
    
  .News-card a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit;
  }

  .News-card a:hover {
      text-decoration: none;
      color: grey;
    }
    
/* end of CSS */
</style>
```
